channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rudy Giuliani Loses His Last Remaining Source Of Income For Spreading Election Lies
item.description: Former Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani was suspended and had his radio show in New York canceled after he spread lies about the 2020 election.

item.title: Illegal Alien Released Into U.S. Allegedly Pulls Girl Into Van and Sexually Assaults Her
item.description: In another case of a horrifying and preventable crime, an illegal alien in Florida is accused of grabbing an 11-year-old girl, dragging her into a van and sexually assaulting her. To read the rest of the article click here The post Illegal Alien Released Into U.S. Allegedly Pulls Girl Into Van and Sexually Assaults Her appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Barron Trump Dumps His Dad By Declining To Be An RNC Delegate
item.description: The Florida Republican Party picked Barron Trump to be a delegate at the Republican convention, but the ex-president's son declined.

item.title: How Denmark Beat Mass Immigration
item.description: Open-borders apologists usually portray mass migration as an unstoppable force that national governments are powerless to stop. However, Denmark has shown that good policies can and do reduce mass immigration and protect a country’s economy. To read the rest of the article click here The post How Denmark Beat Mass Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: GOP May Bail On Kari Lake As Democrats Strongly Back Ruben Gallego
item.description: Republicans have made no major investment in Kari Lake as Democrats put tens of millions of dollars behind Rep. Ruben Gallego in the Arizona Senate race.

item.title: This North Carolina Sheriff Should Know Better
item.description: Generally speaking, police chiefs – particularly those in major urban areas – support illegal alien sanctuary policies that prohibit them from cooperating with federal immigration officials. They’re often pressured to do so by the politicians and special interests who appoint and influence them. To read the rest of the article click here The post This North Carolina Sheriff Should Know Better appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Katie Britt Introduces Bill To Create A National Registry Of Pregnant Women
item.description: Sen. Katie Britt (R-AL) is back on the national scene with new legislation that would create a national registry of pregnant women.

item.title: Stats Show Fentanyl Replacing Heroin as Cartel Cash Cow
item.description: Fentanyl is rapidly replacing heroin as the drug cartels are using to make money. Statistics on drug seizures from U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) show that there has been a clear shift in the cartels’ smuggling habits, and the data strongly indicate that the border chaos of recent years is facilitating this lethal trade. [...] The post Stats Show Fentanyl Replacing Heroin as Cartel Cash Cow appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: The Stench Of Political Death Is Growing Around Trump’s Campaign
item.description: The candidate spends most of his time ranting about his criminal trials. The campaign is struggling to raise money from voters, and there is no swing state operation, as the Trump campaign reeks of political death.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Issue List of Demands After Hundreds Take Over City Park and Refuse to Leave
item.description: In a brazen display of entitlement, hundreds of illegal aliens from Africa and Venezuela swarmed and took over Powell Barnett Park in Seattle. To read the rest of the article click here The post Illegal Aliens Issue List of Demands After Hundreds Take Over City Park and Refuse to Leave appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
